contact.affiliation: International Food Policy Research Institute (IFPRI)

stdyInfo.abstract: The 2014 Global Nutrition Report Dataset contains data for all the indicators that were used in Global Nutrition Report 2014: Actions and Accountability to Accelerate the World's Progress on Nutrition . The data are compiled from secondary sources including United Nations Children's Fund (UNICEF), World Health Organization (WHO), and the World Bank among many others. The dataset broadly contains information on adult and child nutrition, economic demography, nutrition intervention coverage, and policy legislation in the nutrition sector.

sumDscr.dataKind: Compiled data from various secondary sources

IQSS Dataverse Network Terms and Conditions

  1. I will not use the Materials to

  4. I agree that any books, articles, conference papers, theses, dissertations, reports, or other publications that I create which employ data reference the bibliographic citation accompanying this data. These citations include the data authors, data identifier, and other information accord with the Recommended Standard (http://thedata.org/citation/standard) for social science data.

otherMat.txt: This file documents all the files included in this study.
This data file contains complete list of variables/indicators used in the 2014 Global Nutrition Report.
This is a subset of complete 2014 Global Nutrition Report Dataset. It contains data for the indicators relating to policy and legislation in the nutrition sector.
This is a subset of complete 2014 Global Nutrition Report Dataset. It contains data for the indicators that drive and contribute in improving nutrition status.
This is a subset of complete 2014 Global Nutrition Report Dataset. It contains data for the indicators relating to country's economy and demography.
This is a subset of complete 2014 Global Nutrition Report Dataset. It contains data for the indicators relating to nutrition interventions and their coverage.
This is a subset of complete 2014 Global Nutrition Report Dataset. It contains data for the indicators relating to child and adult nutrition status.
